entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
